definition: an annoyance, annoy continually or chronically
details:
noun
- an annoyance
= example: an annoyance
- any large scale calamity (especially when thought to be sent by God)
- a swarm of insects that attack plants
= example: a swarm of insects that attack plants
= synonyms: infestation
- any epidemic disease with a high death rate
= synonyms: pest
- a serious, sometimes fatal, infection of rodents caused by Yersinia pestis and accidentally transmitted to humans by the bite of a flea that has bitten an infected animal
= example: a serious, sometimes fatal, infection of rodents caused by Yersinia pestis and accidentally transmitted to humans by the bite of a flea that has bitten an infected animal
= synonyms: pest
verb
- annoy continually or chronically
= synonyms: hassle
- cause to suffer a blight
= synonyms: blight
